alert.note: Alert for Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 1000 PM MST... At 858 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Phoenix, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Scottsdale, Peoria, Paradise Valley, Youngtown, Sun City, Piestewa Peak Park, Deer Valley Airport, North Mountain Park, Arizona State Fairgrounds, Downtown Peoria, Downtown Phoenix, Arrowhead Mall, Downtown Glendale, Metro Center, and Camelback Mountain. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 196, and between mile markers 200 and 217. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 15. US Highway 60 between mile markers 147 and 160. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 1 and 2. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 8 and 31. This includes AZ Interstate 10 between 143 and 148, and near 149. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley
